item.title: ExxonMobil attempts to limit oil spill on Yellowstone River - latimes.com
item.description: Update: ExxonMobil attempts to limit oil spill on Yellowstone River http://lat.ms/ik2Rjd
item.content:encoded: Update: ExxonMobil attempts to limit oil spill on Yellowstone River http://lat.ms/ik2Rjd “We can’t really tell what it’s going to do for our fisheries downstream,” Eric Beebee, 37, said of the oil as he worked at Bighorn Fly and Tackle Shop in Billings, Sunday. “If it was going to effect anybody, it’s going to be the farmers and the ranchers because the water is pushed up so high, when it receeds, it’s going to be left on their land.” Link - Trackbacks

item.title: レディー・ガガ、“玉ねぎ衣装”で『徹子の部屋』初出演！ ニュース-ORICON STYLE-
item.description: レディー・ガガ、“玉ねぎ衣装”で『徹子の部屋』初出演！ ニュース-ORICON STYLE- http://t.co/jc9iQuv via @oricon 何だよこれｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗ
item.content:encoded: レディー・ガガ、“玉ねぎ衣装”で『徹子の部屋』初出演！ ニュース-ORICON STYLE- http://t.co/jc9iQuv via @oricon　何だよこれｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗ 　人気歌手のレディー・ガガが、11日（月）放送のトーク番組『徹子の部屋』（テレビ朝日系）に初出演することが3日、わかった。日本のトーク番組に初挑戦となったガガは、まるで洋服が土台、頭が“芽”という黒柳徹子の“玉ねぎヘアー”を体いっぱいに表現したかのような全長2m超えの気合いの入った衣装で登場。さらにうず高く巻いた髪からキャンディを取り出し逆プレゼントするなど、終始徹子を圧倒した。　 Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: oricon.co.jp

item.title: Literate Programming - Nobody Understands REST or HTTP
item.description: Nobody Understands REST or HTTP: http://bit.ly/kaR1SN
item.content:encoded: Nobody Understands REST or HTTP: http://bit.ly/kaR1SN The more that I've learned about web development, the more that I've come to appreciate the thoroughness and thoughtfulness of the authors of the HTTP RFC and Roy Fielding's dissertation. It seems like the answers to most problems come down to "There's a section of the spec for that." Now, obviously, they're not infallible, and I'm not saying that there's zero room for improvement. But it really disappoints me when people don't understand the way that a given issue is supposed to be solved, and so they make up a partial solution that solves their given case but doesn't jive well with the way that everything else works. There are valid criticisms of the specs, but they have to come from an informed place about what the spec says in the first place. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: steveklabnik.com

item.title: The Rich Irony of Myspace, Zynga and Owen Van Natta - Kara Swisher - News - AllThingsD
item.description: Revenge Is a Dish Best Served Via an IPO: The Delicious Irony of Myspace, Zynga and Owen Van Natta http://dthin.gs/jJGVDx
item.content:encoded: Revenge Is a Dish Best Served Via an IPO: The Delicious Irony of Myspace, Zynga and Owen Van Natta http://dthin.gs/jJGVDx How's this for irony: It was less than a year and a half ago that Owen Van Natta was ousted from his job as CEO of Myspace. But last week -- just as the failed social networking site sold for a paltry $35 million -- Van Natta could have bought it himself for a fraction of his stake in Zynga, the social gaming phenom that just filed for its IPO and where he's a top exec and shareholder. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: allthingsd.com

item.content:encoded: Guardian Law: US anti-piracy body targets foreign website owners for extradition: Britons could face charges for... http://bit.ly/miwGAr Britons could face charges for breaking US copyrights even if they have no link to America and servers are based elsewhere Link - Trackbacks
